author: Vibhuti Agarwal
title: Bollywood Star Salman Khan Granted Bail in Poaching Case
text:
New Delhiâ€”Bollywood actor Salman Khan was granted bail on Saturday by a local court as he appeals a conviction for killing two endangered antelopes.
In the latest twist in the high-profile case, the Jodhpur District and Sessions Court on Saturday granted the 52-year-old bail, agreeing to release him from jail while he appeals the conviction handed down Thursday and a five-year prison sentence for the offence.

Prosecutors...
